```{r}
library("hflights")
dim(hflights)
nrow(hflights)
ncol(hflights)
colnames(hflights)

range(rownames(hflights))
```

### 기술 통계
    
```{r}
mean(hflights[,"DepTime"])
mean(hflights[,"DepTime"],na.rm=T)
apply(hflights,1,function(x) mean(x, na.rm=T))
apply(hflights,2,function(x) mean(x, na.rm=T))
```
